4557.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|81|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|75|184$يُدْخِلُ|will admit|81|103|12002$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|111|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|104|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|114|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds|125|136|239$جَنَّـٰتٍ|(to) gardens,|108|115|241$تَجْرِى|flow|81|96|242$مِن|from|50|65|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath it|109|124|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ‌ۖ|the rivers,|88|103|244$وَٱلَّذِينَ|but those who|116|131|42$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|91|59$يَتَمَتَّعُونَ|they enjoy|101|107|15779$وَيَأْكُلُونَ|and eat|100|113|15780$كَمَا|as|53|66|110$تَأْكُلُ|eat|64|77|8984$ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ|the cattle,|91|104|12069$وَٱلنَّارُ|and the Fire|100|113|15781$مَثْوًى|(will be) an abode|139|145|13681$لَّهُمْ|for them.|81|81|98$

4559.verse: أَفَمَن|Then is (he) who|133|144|7906$كَانَ|is|57|80|913$عَلَىٰ|on|63|86|52$بَيِّنَةٍ|a clear proof|104|127|5648$مِّن|from|50|73|53$رَّبِّهِۦ|his Lord|71|94|392$كَمَن|like (he) who,|111|122|3461$زُيِّنَ|is made attractive|141|165|1846$لَهُۥ|for him|65|114|977$سُوٓءُ|(the) evil|81|130|7574$عَمَلِهِۦ|(of) his deeds|112|161|14339$وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|while they follow|131|155|945$أَهْوَآءَهُم|their desires.|106|106|1116$

4561.verse: وَمِنْهُم|And among them|131|140|745$مَّن|(are some) who|124|142|76$يَسْتَمِعُ|listen|80|98|5500$إِلَيْكَ|to you,|68|86|45$حَتَّىٰٓ|until|64|82|526$إِذَا|when|55|72|1370$خَرَجُواْ|they depart|98|107|2150$مِنْ|from|50|62|53$عِندِكَ|you,|75|98|4220$قَالُواْ|they say|78|101|101$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|131|750$أُوتُواْ|were given|92|115|940$ٱلْعِلْمَ|the knowledge,|121|144|9942$مَاذَا|`What|63|74|271$قَالَ|has he said|95|108|309$ءَانِفًا‌ۚ|just now?`|92|118|15800$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those -|82|108|51$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) the ones|116|142|20$طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has set a seal|149|175|4611$عَلَىٰ|upon|63|76|52$قُلُوبِهِمْ|their hearts|97|184|66$وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|and they follow|122|297|945$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ|their desires.|106|194|1116$

4562.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|132|42$ٱهْتَدَوْاْ|accept guidance,|135|160|1244$زَادَهُمْ|He increases them|142|167|13981$هُدًى|(in) guidance|107|132|33$وَءَاتَـٰهُمْ|and gives them|121|134|15801$تَقْوَٮٰهُمْ|their righteousness.|151|151|15802$

4563.verse: فَهَلْ|Then do|74|81|6409$يَنظُرُونَ|they wait|102|117|1830$إِلَّا|but|42|57|86$ٱلسَّاعَةَ|(for) the Hour|112|127|9836$أَن|that|48|63|655$تَأْتِيَهُم|it should come to them|173|188|9295$بَغْتَةً‌ۖ|suddenly?|85|92|5526$فَقَدْ|But indeed,|95|101|1016$جَآءَ|have come|92|104|4023$أَشْرَاطُهَا‌ۚ|its indications.|116|128|15803$فَأَنَّىٰ|Then how|85|97|5860$لَهُمْ|to them|72|84|98$إِذَا|when|55|67|1370$جَآءَتْهُمْ|has come to them|140|146|4930$ذِكْرَٮٰهُمْ|their reminder.|116|116|15804$

4564.verse: فَٱعْلَمْ|So know|76|89|5030$أَنَّهُۥ|that [He] -|94|120|2697$لَآ|(there is) no|103|128|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|78|2266$إِلَّا|but|42|68|86$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|78|123$وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ|and ask forgiveness|151|164|3444$لِذَنۢبِكَ|for your sin|95|109|15185$وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|and for the believing men|188|216|9657$وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ‌ۗ|and the believing women.|189|217|7744$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|109|167$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|75|742$مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ|your movement|122|308|15805$وَمَثْوَٮٰكُمْ|and your resting places.|180|366|15806$

4557.verse: Indeed, Allah will admit those who have believed and done righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow, but those who disbelieve enjoy themselves and eat as grazing livestock eat, and the Fire will be a residence for them.

4558.verse: And how many a city was stronger than your city [Makkah] which drove you out? We destroyed them; and there was no helper for them.

4559.verse: So is he who is on clear evidence from his Lord like him to whom the evil of his work has been made attractive and they follow their [own] desires?

4560.verse: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered, rivers of milk the taste of which never changes, rivers of wine delicious to those who drink, and rivers of purified honey, in which they will have from all [kinds of] fruits and forgiveness from their Lord, like [that of] those who abide eternally in the Fire and are given to drink scalding water that will sever their intestines?

4561.verse: And among them, [O Muhammad], are those who listen to you, until when they depart from you, they say to those who were given knowledge, "What has he said just now?" Those are the ones of whom Allah has sealed over their hearts and who have followed their [own] desires.

4562.verse: And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.

4563.verse: Then do they await except that the Hour should come upon them unexpectedly? But already there have come [some of] its indications. Then what good to them, when it has come, will be their remembrance?

4564.verse: So know, [O Muhammad], that there is no deity except Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and believing women. And Allah knows of your movement and your resting place.
